info.name: Tracts in basilar pons
info.description: The basilar or basal portion the pons contains multiple fiber tracts.  These include the descending tracts:  corticospinal, corticobulbar and corticopontine.  In addition, the pontine nuclei in the basilar portion of the pons give rise to the pontocerebellar tracts which cross the midline and gather as the middle cerebellar peduncle where they enter the cerebellum.
